Authors:
suchada Mongkolsamrit, Donnaya Thanakitpipattana, Artit
Khonsanit, Rachada Promharn, Janet Jennifer Luangsa-ard
Title:
Conoideocrella krungchingensis sp. nov. entomopathogenic
fungi from Thailand
Abstract:
Conoideocrella krungchingensis, a fungal pathogen
infecting armoured scale insects (Diaspididae), is described and
illustrated as a new species from Thai. This species resembles C.
luteorostrata but could be distinguished from the latter using the
sequences of LSU and EF-1Î±.
